attributes.action: Give the UK a Referendum to stay within the European Union.
attributes.additional_details: The UK was clearly too far divided on Brexit, with only a narrow margin of success for the leave campaigners. We need a second referendum to make sure that this is indeed the right choice and that it is correct the UK enacts article 50 to leave the European Union.
attributes.background: With negotiations seemingly failing with Brussels, we think it is time that the UK has a second referendum backed by real facts, so that we can be sure once and for all it is the right choice for the country.
